definition: to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Moreover, Huang Jingao had developed secret codes with the mistresses .
sentences.chinese: 此外，黄金高还与每位情妇都商定了幽会暗号。

sentences.english: The countersign of the bill are five- point stars that are dotted everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 此钞暗号是点缀在其各处的五角星。

sentences.english: The scarlet cord was a sign to the spies she wanted to be rescued by them.
sentences.chinese: 朱红线绳是给探子们的暗号，告诉他们她想获救。

sentences.english: This had been the signal in old times when Wildeve had used to come secretly wooing to her.
sentences.chinese: 这本是韦狄从前秘密向她求爱的时候用的暗号。

sentences.english: Seriously, those are signals hat you need to explore.
sentences.chinese: 说真的，它们是你需要去探索的暗号。

sentences.english: Came to the guerrillas, chu head and Bai Cong snow interconnection of codes.
sentences.chinese: 来到游击队，楚团长和白丛雪互接暗号。

sentences.english: He could also use the code to create a message that you could read.
sentences.chinese: 他还可以使用暗号创建您能够读懂的消息。

sentences.english: Along the way, plum leave a handkerchief do sign, intentionally by keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 一路上，梅子故意留下手帕做暗号，被李剑察觉。

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
sentences.chinese: 耶稣对他说，犹大，你用亲嘴的暗号卖人子吗。

sentences.english: It was like the two halves of a countersign .
sentences.chinese: 这倒像个接头暗号分成了两半。

sentences.english: They were not sending signals to each other under the card table last night.
sentences.chinese: 他们昨晚在牌桌底下没有互递暗号。

definition: oral command/a word of command (used in drilling troops or gymnasts)/password (used by sentry)
flag signals (for communicating between ships or army units)/semaphore
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
tacit understanding/mutual understanding/rapport/connected at a deep level with each other/(of team members) well coordinated/tight
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
email (loanword)/see 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to scan a QR code or barcode
